name: OMEGA WING stage one
description:
This is the stage one demo of my first attempt with making a game in shmup creator

a month ago I saw a tool was released called SHMUP CREATOR and immediately got to work trying to make something similar to my favorite shmups like capcom's Gigawing and Raiden fighters and this is the result this stage took exactly 75.3 hours to make.

I don't know if I will turn this into a full game. depends on the public reaction
